name: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON INNOVATIVE RESEARCHES IN AGRICULTURE, FOOD SCIENCE, FORESTRY AND ANIMAL SCIENCE
content: The International Conference on Innovative Researches in Agriculture, Food Science, Forestry and Animal Science (ICIRAFFA 2017) will be held in singapore during June 8-9, 2017\. It is an international conference with focus on presenting novels and fundamental advances in the fields of Agriculture and Animal Science.
